statements: UPDATE air_traffic_control SET frequency='123.45 MHz', pilot='John Doe', message='Requesting landing clearance' WHERE communication_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE air_traffic_control SET pilot='Jane Smith', communication_timestamp='2022-10-15 08:30:00', message='Cleared to land on Runway 27' WHERE communication_id='223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE air_traffic_control SET message = 'Flight delayed due to bad weather' WHERE pilot = 'John Doe' AND communication_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00';
UPDATE air_traffic_control SET frequency = 'Emergency' , message = 'Mayday! Mayday! Engine failure!' WHERE communication_id = 'b02d2e51-a228-4ca6-8dbb-06b61c7edcdc';
UPDATE air_traffic_control SET receiver_name='ATC_Admin' WHERE communication_id=1;
UPDATE aircraft SET capacity=200, model='Boeing 777' WHERE aircraft_id=3;
UPDATE air_traffic_control SET sender_name='ATC Center', receiver_name='Aircraft 1', message='Change in route approved.', timestamp='2022-06-30 12:30:00' WHERE communication_id=1;
UPDATE aircraft SET capacity=300, registration_number='ABC123', manufacturer='Boeing', model='737' WHERE aircraft_id=2;
UPDATE air_traffic_control_communications SET communication_text = 'Emergency landing approved' WHERE communication_id = 1;
UPDATE aircraft SET airline = 'Delta Airlines', aircraft_type = 'Boeing 747' WHERE aircraft_id = 3;
UPDATE air_traffic_control_communications SET communication_text='Emergency landing authorized for Flight 123', communication_timestamp='2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE communication_id=1;
UPDATE aircraft SET airline='Delta Airlines', aircraft_type='Boeing 737', registration_number='N12345' WHERE aircraft_id=5;
UPDATE air_traffic_controllers SET controller_rating = 5 WHERE controller_id = 1;
UPDATE airports SET airport_type = 'International' WHERE airport_id = 3;
UPDATE air_traffic_controllers SET controller_rating = 8 WHERE controller_id = 101;
UPDATE airports SET airport_location = 'New Location' WHERE airport_id = 201;
UPDATE air_traffic_controllers SET controller_rank='Senior' WHERE controller_id=1;
UPDATE aircrafts SET manufacturer='Boeing', capacity=200 WHERE aircraft_id=3;
UPDATE air_traffic_controllers SET controller_rank = 'Senior' WHERE controller_id = 101;
UPDATE flights SET departure_time = '2022-09-15 08:00:00' WHERE flight_id = 201;
